Question: In July 1937 this person sailed to France—bringing his convertible—and spent ten weeks driving through Europe with Billings.
Hints: For the school yearbook, of which he had been business manager, this person was voted the "most likely to succeed".
After ****'s assassination, President Johnson passed NSAM 273 on November 26, 1963.
In 1961, this person anxiously anticipated a summit with Soviet Premier Nikita Khrushchev.
